color: pink, blue, purple, silver, red, black, or white
preset_modes: 18 preset modes (e.g. soft skin, close-up, night)
ISO: up to 51200 ISO with little noise

effects: 10 artistic effect modes (big eyes, vivid, lighter or darker skin tones, etc.)
settings: manual control and various automatic settings (video modeburst shooting, etc.)
long_exposure: 60 seconds max with Long Shutter Mode

effects: 18 glamor retouch effects (big eyes, small face, soft focus, etc.)
